1.name: Revolver of Fortune
1.description:
Active Skill
Use a random bullet for different moves:
Powerful Firework Shell: Fires at the enemy with great force, dealing massive Physical DMG and accumulating a large amount of Physical Anomaly Buildup.
Regular Firework Shell: Fires at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG and accumulating Physical Anomaly Buildup.
Paintball: Fails to fire as flowers leave the muzzle.

1.name: Luck is Skill
1.description:
Additional Ability
When there are 2 or more Physical Attribute characters in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack inflicts 100% more Anomaly Buildup.

2.name: Luck is Skill
2.description:
Additional Ability
When there are 2 or more Physical Attribute characters in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack inflicts 125% more Anomaly Buildup.

3.name: Luck is Skill
3.description:
Additional Ability

4.name: Luck is Skill
4.description:
Additional Ability
When there are 2 or more Physical Attribute characters in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack inflicts 175% more Anomaly Buildup.

5.name: Luck is Skill
5.description:
Additional Ability
When there are 2 or more Physical Attribute characters in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack inflicts 200% more Anomaly Buildup.

1.name: Lucky Trigger
1.description:
Bangboo Chain Attack
Fire continuous shots at the target, dealing Physical DMG and accumulating massive Physical Anomaly Buildup.
